yogasanas.name: Mountain Pose
yogasanas.benefit: Improves posture and balance while strengthening the legs and core.
steps: Stand with feet together, arms at sides
Distribute weight evenly across both feet
Engage thigh muscles and lift kneecaps
Roll shoulders back and down
Breathe deeply for 30-60 seconds

yogasanas.name: Tree Pose (Vrikshasana)
steps: Start in Mountain Pose.
Shift weight to one foot and raise the other foot to inner thigh or calf.
Bring palms together at chest or overhead.
Hold, then switch sides.

yogasanas.name: Child's Pose (Balasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Calms the mind and gently stretches back and hips.
steps: Kneel and sit back on your heels.
Lean forward, extend arms, and rest forehead on the mat.
Breathe deeply and relax the body.
Release after holding.

yogasanas.name: Cat-Cow Pose (Marjaryasana-Bitilasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Improves spinal mobility and relieves back tension.
steps: Come to hands and knees (tabletop).
Inhale and arch your back (Cow).
Exhale and round your spine (Cat).
Flow between these movements slowly.

yogasanas.name: Downward-Facing Dog (Adho Mukha Svanasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Stretches the whole body and strengthens arms and legs.
steps: Start on hands and knees.
Lift hips up and back into an inverted V shape.
Press heels toward the floor and engage your core.
Breathe and hold.

yogasanas.name: Cobra Pose (Bhujangasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Strengthens the back and opens the chest.
steps: Lie face down with legs extended.
Place palms under shoulders.
Inhale and lift chest using back muscles.
Keep hips grounded and gaze forward.

yogasanas.name: Bridge Pose (Setu Bandhasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Strengthens the back, glutes, and opens the chest.
steps: Lie on your back with knees bent.
Feet hip-width apart and arms by your sides.
Press feet into the floor and lift hips up.
Hold and then slowly lower.

yogasanas.name: Corpse Pose (Savasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Promotes deep relaxation and stress relief.
steps: Lie flat on your back.
Spread legs slightly apart.
Relax arms by your sides, palms up.
Close eyes and breathe calmly.

yogasanas.name: Warrior I (Virabhadrasana I)
yogasanas.benefit: Builds leg strength, balance, and focus.
steps: Step one foot forward into a lunge.
Angle the back foot slightly outward.
Raise arms overhead with palms facing each other.
Bend front knee and hold.

yogasanas.name: Warrior II (Virabhadrasana II)
yogasanas.benefit: Strengthens legs, opens hips, and improves stamina.
steps: From Mountain Pose, step feet wide apart.
Turn front foot forward and back foot slightly in.
Raise arms parallel to the floor.
Bend front knee and gaze over front hand.

yogasanas.name: Seated Forward Bend (Paschimottanasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Stretches the back and hamstrings while calming the mind.
steps: Sit with legs extended.
Inhale, lengthen through the spine.
Exhale and fold forward toward your feet.
Hold and breathe steady.

yogasanas.name: Easy Pose (Sukhasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Encourages relaxed seated posture and improves focus.
steps: Sit cross-legged on the floor.
Rest hands on knees.
Lengthen your spine and relax shoulders.
Breathe deeply and hold.

yogasanas.name: High Lunge (Anjaneyasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Stretches hip flexors and strengthens legs.
steps: Step one foot forward into a lunge.
Lower back knee slightly (optional).
Raise arms overhead.
Keep hips square and hold.

yogasanas.name: Reclined Spinal Twist (Supta Matsyendrasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Releases tension in the back and improves spinal mobility.
steps: Lie on your back.
Bring one knee into your chest.
Cross it over to the opposite side.
Extend arms outward and breathe.

yogasanas.name: Seated Side Stretch (Parsva Sukhasana)
yogasanas.benefit: Stretches the sides of the body and improves breathing.
steps: Sit cross-legged.
Reach one arm overhead and lean to the opposite side.
Keep hips grounded and breathe deep.
Switch sides.
